home.intro: FinRule is the next-generation Loan Origination System (LOS) built for banks and FIs. Our intelligent automation platform enables financial institutions to digitize and optimize every step of the lending journey—from online applications and credit analysis to digital document management and AI customer and product analysis.
home.experience: Experience intelligent lending. Request a demo today or explore how FinRule can fit into your banking infrastructure.

companyOverview.title: Company Overview
companyOverview.content: FinRule is a financial technology company headquartered in the United States, offering AI- powered, cloud-native software solutions that modernize lending operations. Designed specifically for banks and FI with striving for next level of digitalization, our mission is to help institutions operate with the agility of fintechs while ensuring enterprise-grade reliability and compliance. FinRule solves this by offering a modular LOS platform that digitizes every step of the loan lifecycle: from omnichannel origination and AI-based underwriting to  reporting and credit committee memos.Our API-first platform automates rule-based decisions, modernizes underwriting, and simplifies digital lending.

ourJourney.title: Our Journey
ourJourney.content: Founded by banking transformation veterans, FinRule was created to solve the inefficiencies of legacy LOS systems and to deliver a digital-first solution that simplifies operations while maintaining strict compliance. Over 4,500 small and midsize banks in the US rely on outdated LOS systems, siloed credit workflows, and spreadsheets—exposing them to  risk, slow time-to-decision, and missed revenue opportunities. Lowering Time-to-say-YES but also WHAT as general principle, guided as to construct flexible, modular, efficent platform giving essential focus on end-clients needs

product.heading: PRODUCT
product.description: FinRule’s Loan Origination System is engineered for digital lending at scale. The platform provides robust automation across every step of the loan lifecycle—allowing lenders to reduce manual work, increase underwriting precision, and meet growing customer expectations for seamless, online services. FinRule employs an enterprise SaaS model with tiered pricing based on loan volume, user roles, and add-on clients rule-based modules. Integration and onboarding services are billed separately. Premium analytics, CRM integrations, AI preapprovals and automated reporting offer additional monetization.
